verses.verse: Who hath <S%H539>believed<s%> our <S%H8052>message<s%>? and to whom hath the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> been <S%H1540>revealed<s%>?

For he grew <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him as a tender <S%H3126>plant<s%>, and as a <S%H8328>root<s%> out of a <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>ground<s%>: he hath no <S%H8389>form<s%> nor <S%H1926>comeliness<s%>; and when we <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4758>him<s%>, there is no beauty that we should desire <S%H2530>him<s%>.

He was <S%H959>despised<s%>, and <S%H2310>rejected<s%> of <S%H376>men<s%>; a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4341>sorrows<s%>, and <S%H3045>acquainted<s%> with <S%H2483>grief<s%>: and <S%H4564>as<s%> one from whom men hide their <S%H6440>face<s%> he was <S%H959>despised<s%>; and we esteemed him <S%H2803>not<s%>.

Surely <S%H403><s%> he hath <S%H5375>borne<s%> our <S%H2483>griefs<s%>, and <S%H5445>carried<s%> our <S%H4341>sorrows<s%>; yet we did <S%H2803>esteem<s%> him <S%H5060>stricken<s%>, <S%H5221>smitten<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H6031>afflicted<s%>.

But he was <S%H2490>wounded<s%> for our <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>, he was <S%H1792>bruised<s%> for our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>; the <S%H4148>chastisement<s%> of our <S%H7965>peace<s%> was upon <S%H2250>him<s%>; and with his stripes we are <S%H7495>healed<s%>.

All we like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> have gone <S%H8582>astray<s%>; we have <S%H6437>turned<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to his own <S%H1870>way<s%>; and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H6293>laid<s%> on him the iniquity of us <S%H5771>all<s%>.

He was <S%H5065>oppressed<s%>, yet when he was <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> he <S%H6605>opened<s%> not his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; as a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> that is <S%H2986>led<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter<s%>, and as a <S%H7353>sheep<s%> that <S%H6440>before<s%> its <S%H1494>shearers<s%> is <S%H481>dumb<s%>, so he <S%H6605>opened<s%> not his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

By <S%H6115>oppression<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment<s%> he was <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H1755>away<s%>; and as for his generation, who among them <S%H7878>considered<s%> that he was cut <S%H1504>off<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> for the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> to whom the stroke was <S%H5061>due<s%>?

And they <S%H5414>made<s%> his <S%H6913>grave<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, and with a <S%H6223>rich<s%> man in his <S%H4194>death<s%>; although he had <S%H6213>done<s%> no <S%H2555>violence<s%>, neither was any <S%H4820>deceit<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

Yet it <S%H2654>pleased<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H1792>bruise<s%> <S%H2470>him<s%>; he hath put him to grief: when thou shalt <S%H7760>make<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> an offering for <S%H817>sin<s%>, he shall <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H2233>seed<s%>, he shall <S%H748>prolong<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%>, and the <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

He shall <S%H7200>see<s%> of the <S%H5999>travail<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>: by the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of himself shall my <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6663>justify<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%>; and he shall <S%H5445>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>.

Therefore will I <S%H2505>divide<s%> him a portion with the <S%H7227>great<s%>, and he shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> with the <S%H6099>strong<s%>; because he poured <S%H6168>out<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> unto <S%H4194>death<s%>, and was <S%H4487>numbered<s%> with the <S%H6586>transgressors<s%>: yet he <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H2399>sin<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%>, and made <S%H6293>intercession<s%> for the <S%H6586>transgressors<s%>.
